name: Game of Thrones: Episode Two - The Lost Lords
name_original: Game of Thrones: Episode Two - The Lost Lords
description:
Game of Thrones: Episode Two - The Lost Lords is an adventure game developed by Telltale Games. It was originally released in 2015. It was published by Telltale Games. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Game of Thrones: Episode Two - The Lost Lords is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
